channel.title: Help, With Deltascape Source Exp Changing
channel.description: How Do I Change The Exp Rate For Runecrafting?[br][br][size=1]Posted on: December 12, 2008, 11:35:47 am[/size][hr]Can Somebody Help Me Please, Im Stuck..

item.title: Help, With Deltascape Source Exp Changing
item.dc:creator: @1_vitiello_1 1 vitiello 1
item.description:
@1_vitiello_1 wrote:

[quote=“moparwha, post:3, topic:250198”][quote author=1 vitiello 1 link=topic=329919.msg2578714#msg2578714 date=1229131169]
Dear wild,
I have read your problem and you seem to need help. To change Deltascape’s Exp Rate you must find a code similar to this:[quote] double TotalExp = 0;
if (UseBow || UseCrossBow) {
TotalExp = (double)(115hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), 4);
} else if (FightType != 3) {
TotalExp = (double)(115hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID);
} else {
TotalExp = (double)(115hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength);
}
TotalExp = (double)(115hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints);
attackTimer = 7;[/quote]

As you can see, the (115*hitDiff) is the exp, you can chnage it to whatever Exp Rate you would like.

Note: This is not from the Deltasource, this is from EliteScape based from Deltascape.Edited.

I hope I have helped your problem.

~i vitiello i~
[/quote]

Good reply but we don’t spoonfeed[/quote]
You don’t, but i may. Please keep your comments to yourself…

Read full topic
item.source: Help, With Deltascape Source Exp Changing

item.title: Help, With Deltascape Source Exp Changing
item.dc:creator: @1_vitiello_1 1 vitiello 1
item.description:
@1_vitiello_1 wrote:

Dear wild,
I have read your problem and you seem to need help. To change Deltascape’s Exp Rate you must find a code similar to this:

double TotalExp = 0;
if (UseBow || UseCrossBow) {
TotalExp = (double)(115hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), 4);
} else if (FightType != 3) {
TotalExp = (double)(115hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), SkillID);
} else {
TotalExp = (double)(115hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerAttack);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerDefence);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerStrength);
}
TotalExp = (double)(115hitDiff);
TotalExp = (double)(TotalExpCombatExpRate);
addSkillXP((int)(TotalExp), playerHitpoints);
attackTimer = 7;

As you can see, the (115*hitDiff) is the exp, you can chnage it to whatever Exp Rate you would like.

Note: This is not from the Deltasource, this is from EliteScape based from Deltascape.Edited.

I hope I have helped your problem.

~i vitiello i~
